Notes: I have designed this for the 3x3w 6 pin rgb, as that is what I had on hand, but the 3x1w 6 pin rgb will almost certainly work as well, and the led driver does not even close to deliver 3 watts

around 4g of filament, if done through jlc3dp with standard resin, costs 0.36

Economy of scale does come into play here, especially with the attiny and the pcbs
